amendment.description: An amendment to strike all after the enacting clause and insert new text and title.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mitchell amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Mitchell.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mitchell amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Mitchell amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
